subroutine set_single_channel_boundary (advect_bc_lo, advect_data_lo, advect_bc_hi, advect_data_hi, diffuse_bc_lo, diffuse_data_lo, diffuse_bc_hi, diffuse_data_hi)

 Advective flux boundary condition for a single channel, delagates to an implementation at each end.

Public Attributes

procedure(boundary_advective_flux_if),
pointer 		advective_flux_lo = > null()
 Advective fluxes on lo and hi side of single channel. Each is expected to operate on only one end.
procedure(boundary_advective_flux_if),
pointer 		advective_flux_hi = > null()
procedure(boundary_diffusive_flux_if),
pointer 		diffusion_flux_lo = > null()
 Diffusive fluxes on lo and hi side of single channel. Each is expected to operate on only one end.
procedure(boundary_diffusive_flux_if),
pointer 		diffusion_flux_hi = > null()
procedure(boundary_diffusive_matrix_if),
pointer 		diffusion_matrix_lo = > null()
 Diffusive matrix on lo and hi side of single channel. Each is expected to operate on only one end.
procedure(boundary_diffusive_matrix_if),
pointer 		diffusion_matrix_hi = > null()
procedure(boundary_data_if),
pointer 		advection_data_lo = > null()
 User settable function that provides the data (concentration or derivative) used for the BC.
procedure(boundary_data_if),
pointer 		advection_data_hi = > null()
procedure(boundary_data_if),
pointer 		diffusion_data_lo = > null()
procedure(boundary_data_if),
pointer 		diffusion_data_hi = > null()

Detailed Description

Boundary conditions for a single channel.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine single_channel_boundary::dirichlet_advective_flux_hi ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_hi,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx 
)

Example advective flux that imposes dirichlet boundaries on high side.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]flux_loflux on lo side of cell at time
[in,out]flux_hiflux on hi side of cell at time
[in]flow_loflow on lo side of cells centered at time
[in]flow_hiflow on hi side of cells centered at time
[in]conc_loconcentration extrapolated to lo face
[in]conc_hiconcentration extrapolated to hi face
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine single_channel_boundary::dirichlet_advective_flux_lo ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_lo,

)

dirichlet boundary condition that sets only the hi side boundary

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]diffusive_flux_loFace flux, lo side
[in,out]diffusive_flux_hiFace flux, hi side
[in]area_loLow side area
[in]area_hiHigh side area
[in]timeTime
[in]concConcentration
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]dtSpatial step
[in]dxTime step

dirichlet boundary condition that sets only the low side boundary

subroutine single_channel_boundary::dirichlet_diffusive_matrix_hi ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  theta_stm,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Matrix boundary condition for dirichlet, only operates on high end.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine single_channel_boundary::dirichlet_diffusive_matrix_lo ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  down_diag,

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

)

Example advective flux that imposes Neumann boundaries on hi side of channel.

)

Matrix boundary condition for neumann, only operates on high end.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine single_channel_boundary::neumann_diffusive_matrix_lo ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  center_diag,

subroutine single_channel_boundary::single_channel_boundary_advective_flux ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_hi,

Advective flux boundary condition for a single channel, delagates to an implementation at each end.

[in]ncellNumber of cells

[in]conc_hiconcentration extrapolated to hi face

)

Matrix boundary condition, delagates to an implementation at each end.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit

[in]dtTime step
